text: A ga lo itse gore ba ba dirang dilo tse di ntseng jalo ga ba na seabe mo Bogosing jwa Modimo? Lo se ka lwa itsietsa. Ba ba tshelang botshelo jo bo makgapha, ba ba obamelang medimo ya disetwa, bagokagadi kgotsa banna ba ba tlhakanelang dikobo le banna ka bone ga ba na seabe mo bogosing jwa one. Le fa e le magodu, kgotsa batho ba ba bohula, matagwa, bakgadi kgotsa baikgagapedi.
